author: Paul Donoughue
title: Parks and Recreation is coming back. Here's what you need to know
description: In a one-off special, Pawnee, Indiana, civil servant Leslie Knope is trying to stay connected with friends and colleagues during these times of social distancing.
content:
Posted 
April 24, 2020 16:02:49
Your favourite troupe of dysfunctional local bureaucrats is back.
The original cast members of beloved US sitcom Parks and Recreation, including Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Chris Pratt and Aziz Ansari, will reprise their rol… [+2376 chars]
